Package edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.recipe

Interface RecipeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipeServiceImplementation
@Service public interface RecipeService
Service interface for handling recipe related operations. Provides methods for fetching, creating, and updating recipes, as well as for calculating recommended recipes based on the contents of a fridge. Also provides methods for converting between Recipe and RecipeDTO and between GroceryItemRecipe and GroceryItemRecipeDto.

    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object>
    addRecipe(RecipeDTO recipe)
    Adds a new recipe to the repository and returns a ResponseEntity object containing the added recipe in DTO form.
    double
    compareFridgeAndRecipeList(Map<Long,GroceryItemFridgeAlgoDto> fridge, List<GroceryItemRecipeDto> recipe)
    Compares the contents of a HashMap representing the fridge to a list of grocery items required to make a recipe, and returns a double value between 0 and 1 indicating the level of matching between the two.
    List<RecipeResponseDTO>
    convertToRecipeResponseDTO(List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>> listOfGroceryItemRecipeLists)
    Converts a list of lists containing GroceryItemRecipeDto objects into a list of RecipeResponseDTO objects.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object>
    deleteRecipe(Long recipeId)
    Deletes the recipe with the given recipeId from the database.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<RecipeDTO>>
    getAllRecipe()
    Retrieves all the recipes available and returns them as a set of RecipeDTO objects wrapped in a ResponseEntity.
    List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>>
    getAllRecipeList()
    Retrieves all recipes and their associated grocery items from the repository, and returns them as a list of lists of GroceryItemRecipeDto objects.
    double
    getExpirationDateWeight(LocalDate dateToday, LocalDate expirationDate)
    Calculates the expiration date weight for a given item.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object>
    getRecipeAndAllIngredients(Long recipeId)
    Retrieves a recipe and its associated ingredients by the recipe ID.
    Optional<Recipe>
    getRecipeById(Long recipeId)
    Retrieves a recipe by its ID from the repository.
    List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>>
    getRecipesOverThreshold(Map<Long,GroceryItemFridgeAlgoDto> fridge, List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>> recipeList)
    Filters the recipes based on the comparison between fridge contents and recipe grocery items.
    List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>>
    getRecommendedRecipes(Long fridgeId, int portions)
    Retrieves recommended recipes based on the available items in the specified fridge.
    double[]
    getWeightListOfRecipeList(Map<Long,GroceryItemFridgeAlgoDto> fridgeMap, List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>> recipesOverThreshold)
    Calculates the weight of each recipe in the recipesOverThreshold list based on the available fridge items.
    int
    partition(double[] weight, List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>> recipes, int low, int high)
    A helper method that partitions the given recipes and their associated weights according to the Quick Sort algorithm.
    void
    quickSort(double[] weight, List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>> recipes, int low, int high)
    Sorts the double[] weight and List<List> recipe in descending order based on the values in weight using the Quick Sort algorithm.
    Map<Long,GroceryItemFridgeAlgoDto>
    retrieveFridgeItemsHashMap(long fridgeId)
    Retrieves all grocery items in a fridge and returns them as a HashMap with the grocery item ID as the key and a GroceryItemFridgeAlgoDto object containing the grocery item details as the value.
    List<List<GroceryItemRecipeDto>>
    retrieveRecommendedWeekMenu(Long fridgeId, int portions)
    Retrieves a list of recommended recipes for a week based on the ingredients available in the fridge.
    void
    updateFridgeAfterRecipe(Map<Long,GroceryItemFridgeAlgoDto> fridge, List<GroceryItemRecipeDto> recipe)
    Updates the fridge's grocery items after using a recipe.
